name: One Nightstand (Ric Cowley)
description:
You have awoken in a strange bed, with no memory of the night before, and no idea where you are.

And the world's most beautiful nightstand is standing before you.

From one half of the team that brought you the incredibly niche visual novel parody Phoenix Wright - Turnabout Cuddles! comes an incredibly niche visual novel parody of a game that the creator has never actually played.

Features:

  • Multiple endings! Can you find them all?
  • Multiple songs! Will you actually listen to any of them?
  • Multiple jokes! Are they actually funny?

One Nightstand asks the question, "why would anyone make this?", and completely fails to answer it over the course of five-to-ten minutes.
